title: Checkbox
description: Displays a form checkbox or a component that looks like a checkbox.

body.raw: ## checkbox Displays a form checkbox field or a component that looks like an checkbox field. ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/checkbox" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
